ValidationRule.description: If the type of request is anything other than "Non-Client Related", an account value is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Request_Type__c, "Demo / Pre-Sales"), ISPICKVAL(Request_Type__c, "Project / Implementation")), ISBLANK( Account__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Based on the type of request, an Account value is required. Please also select the specific Opportunity, if known.
